DOC.brief_summary: Phase I/II clinical trial analyze safety efficiency intralesional application bispecific single chain antibody rM28 autologous PBMCs patient metastatic melanoma stage III/IV unresectable metastasis .
DOC.brief_title: Local Treatment Metastatic Melanoma With Autologous Lymphocytes Bispecific Antibody rM28
DOC.detailed_description: Phase I/II clinical trial analyze safety efficiency intralesional application bispecific single chain antibody rM28 autologous PBMCs patient metastatic melanoma stage III/IV unresectable metastasis . The antibody direct epitops human CD28 melanoma associate surface antigen HMV-MAA . Treatment 5 day dose escalation .
DOC.criteria: malignant melanoma stage III/IV injectable soft tissue metastasis inform consent give Karnofsky > = 70 % additional chemotherapeutical treatment systemic glucocorticoid brain metestasis malignancy
